text: Insurity is a leading provider of cloud-based solutions and data analytics for the world’s largest insurers, brokers, and MGAs. Trusted by 15 of the top 25 P&C carriers in the US, Insurity empowers clients to focus on their core businesses, optimize their operations, and deliver superior customer experiences. Our modern, API-based architecture facilitates quick, seamless implementations. Our low-code/no-code environment empowers insurers to quickly and easily build their own apps and integrate third-party services, continuously responding to ever-changing market needs. Always stay one step ahead of your customers’ needs—and your competitors! Founded in 1985, Insurity is an information systems pioneer in the insurance industry. Our domain expertise runs deep: our team members average over 15 years of insurance industry experience, we work with 15 of the top 25 P&C carriers in the US, and we have over 250 client relationships, some exceeding 25 years. Insurity is the undisputed cloud leader.  With the most experienced insurance cloud operations team, and with over 200 cloud deployments—the most in the industry—Insurity offers unparalleled scalability, security, and reliability for users in over 100 countries.  “Four nines” of availability ensures 99.99% uptime, globally. Over 20 years’ experience delivering core systems in the cloud. Insurity has over 250 clients globally. Insurity solutions manage over 100 lines of business. 15 of the top 25 US P&C carriers are Insurity clients. Insurity leads the industry with over 200 cloud deployments. Insurity users are located in over 100 countries.
